translationtableentry.text: Mappa dall'orografia impervia che può rendere difficile il passaggio degli eserciti.
translationtableentry.result: Map with impervious orography that can make the passage of armies difficult.

translationtableentry.text: Mapa de orografía abrupta que puede dificultar el paso de los ejércitos.
translationtableentry.result: Map with impervious orography that can make the passage of armies difficult.
